thread.title: BETTINA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by BETTINA

author: BETTINA
title: BETTINA
text:
The whole experience with Redspot was over all very satisfactory , however, I was given conflicting information from the Coolangatta office regarding the use of my debit card for payment of the rental in Melbourne.
I had to use my husbands credit card ( who wasn't travelling with me) to be used as a $200 security payment. No identification was asked for on presentation of this card. Then I was told it would take up to two weeks to get that security deposit returned.
This I feel should have been returned straight away given that no payments had to be charged on the return of the vehicle .
Kind regards,
Bettina White.
